content.question: What point does Mr. Noda make?

choices.label: Students who participate in club activities are healthy.
Students will buy unhealthy snacks at convenience stores.
The school cafeteria has too many unhealthy options.
Healthy eating habits should be taught at home.

content.answer: Students will buy unhealthy snacks at convenience stores.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
